subject: Baseball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Children and Youth
lead_paragraph: The Mets have used several young players this season, but R. A. Dickey, a 35-year-old knuckleballer, has been the team’s unlikely star.
snippet: The Mets have used several young players this season, but R. A. Dickey, a 35-year-old knuckleballer, has been the team’s unlikely star.
